cpl.readme:
This plugin provides a minimal "new Tiddler" interface, if a search doesn't return any results. There are 2 buttons. * {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} .. Clear the temporary template tiddler * {{$:/core/images/done-button}} .. Save the tiddler ''Important:'' This plugin modifies a core module and templates
    <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/new-tiddler-from-search]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]] ">
  • <$link to=<>><>
